packages.name: MavensMate
packages.description: MavensMate for Sublime Text is a plugin that aims to replicate the functionality of the Eclipse-based Force.com IDE.
packages.author: joeferraro

osx.release_notes: Resolves issue where certain users experienced incorrect operation result message during project compile. Also resolves a minor bug when handling a v29.0 metadata api response. OSX Users: 0.36.0 of MavensMate.app is also available, so please update.
